addAllowNotificationApps(ComponentName, ArrayList<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DevicePackageManager
add package names(s) to allow app white list by the current admin.
addApn(ComponentName, Map<String, String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceNetworkManager
Called by an application that is administering the device to add apn to the device.
addBluetoothDevicesToBlackList(ComponentName, ArrayList<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceBluetoothManager
Called by an application that is administering the device set the Bluetooth device to blacklist.
addBluetoothDevicesToWhiteList(ComponentName, ArrayList<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceBluetoothManager
Called by an application that is administering the device set the Bluetooth device to whitelist.
addDisabledDeactivateMdmPackages(ComponentName, List<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DevicePackageManager
add package name(s) to disabled deactive button app list by the current admin.After setting this, this user can not deactivate the button when its' package name in this list.
addDisallowedRunningApp(ComponentName, List<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceApplicationManager
add package name(s) to disallowed running app list by the current admin.After setting this, this user can not launch the app when its' package name in this list.
addDisallowedUninstallPackages(ComponentName, List<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DevicePackageManager
add package name(s) to disallowed uninstall app list by the current admin.After setting this, this user can not uninstall the app when its' package name in this list.
addIgnoreFrequentRelaunchAppList(ComponentName, ArrayList<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceApplicationManager
Add launcher app packages to the list in which apps frequently restart will not cause a prompt hint by the current admin.
addInstallPackageBlackList(ComponentName, ArrayList<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceApplicationManager
Add package name to the black list which apps can't be installed by the current admin.
addInstallPackageWhiteList(ComponentName, List<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DevicePackageManager
add package name(s) to app installation white list by the current admin.After setting this, this user can only install app when its' package name this list, and this function will not take effection on the system app.
addMdmNumberList(ComponentName, ArrayList<String>, int, boolean, boolean) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DevicePhoneManager
Add phone number string to black/white list
addNetworkAccessBlackList(ComponentName, ArrayList<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceNetworkManager
Called by an application that is administering the device to add network access black-list for the admin.
addNetworkAccessWhitelist(ComponentName, List<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceNetworkManager
Called by an application that is administering the device to add network access white list on the device.
addPersistentApp(ComponentName, List<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceApplicationManager
add package name(s) to persistent app list by the current admin.After setting this, this user can not kill app process when its' package name in this list once launched, and this function will not take effection on the system app.
addSingleApp(ComponentName, String) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceApplicationManager
Set a application as the single application by it's name.
addSSIDToBlackList(ComponentName, ArrayList<String>) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceWifiPolicyManager
Add a list of SSID to blacklist, invocation will fail and return false under these sceanarios: 1 @ssids being null, empty or length beyond BLACKLIST_SIZE_LIMIT 2 The updated size of overall blacklist is beyond BLACKLIST_SIZE_LIMIT 3 Any entry in @ssids is null, empty or its size beyond SSID_LENGTH_LIMIT
allowPassiveLocation(ComponentName, boolean) - 类 中的方法com.huawei.android.app.admin.DeviceLocationManager
allow the passive location enable or not
